1.ara-name: كتاب الطهارة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Adiyy bin Thabit narrated from his father, that :the Prophet said about the Mustahadah that she should: "Leave the Salat for the days of her period which she menstruates in, then perform Ghusl, and perform Wudu for every Salat, and observe Saum and perform Salat

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ الْمُسْتَحَاضَةَ تَتَوَضَّأُ لِكُلِّ صَلاَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Mustahadah Performing Wudu For Every Prayer
